short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add events to your calendar, seamlessly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EasEvent is a user-friendly extension designed to streamline adding events to your calendar. With just a simple highlight of the event text, this Chrome extension will diligently gather the necessary information from the text and effortlessly generate an event for you.

EasEvent currently supports both Google Calendar and the general ICS event files, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of calendar platforms.
